author: Peter Bergen, CNN National Security Analyst
title: Infectious disease expert: We're only in the second inning of the pandemic
description: Infectious disease expert Michael Osterholm discussed the coronavirus with Peter Bergen. He decries the lack of a national long-term strategy for the pandemic and notes that there are real questions about the efficacy of the antibody tests that are being deve…
content:
Peter Bergen is CNN's national security analyst, a vice president at New America and a professor of practice at Arizona State University. He is the editor of the Coronavirus Daily Brief and author of the new book "Trump and His Generals: The Cost of Chaos."
